assignscript.node: Don't worry, we'll get out of this mess alive. Lets exterminate those things outside to start with.
Ready for some target practice? Go kill a Zombie outside then come back to me.

completescript.node: Alright, I see you have some fighting skills.

assignscript.node: Lets go get some more practice in. Go kill three zombies and show me if you can handle it...

completescript.node: Not bad. Ready for a real challenge?

assignscript.node: Okay, so below us is a cave, and it has been invested with a radioactive worm.
Travel due east (or due west) and find one of the two cave entrances. From there you know what to do.
Come back to me when you get rid of that worm.

completescript.node: This next one is kinda a rush. We only have 5 minutes.
